role.argrole: necessity, need or requirementfor (usually marked by ل )

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينطلق) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MP هؤلاء)) (PP (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجرد) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN كون) (PUNC ") (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG القرنة)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ضرورة)) (PUNC ") (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الساحة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المسيحية)))))))
